transcript:
Customer: The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later. Aapne jis vyakti ko
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Assalam walekum.
Executive: Walekum assalam, kaun?
Customer: Parvez bol raha hu IndiaMART se, aapne call kiya tha abhi.
Customer: Arey mera to phone koi uthata hi nahi hai, main itni der se call kar rahi hu.
Executive: Accha ki shadi thi par shadi hai, do din pehle shadi hui thi.
Customer: Ab apni chutti pe hai.
Executive: Haan, apni shadi hui hai.
Customer: Accha unki apni shadi hui hai?
Executive: Apni shadi hui hai, haan.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: To isliye koi call nahi utha raha tha.
Customer: Chaliye, main subah se lekar abhi tak bhi call kar rahi thi.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Chaliye wo mere handloom walon ke liye wo dali thi na complaint aapke paas?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To unhone saman to nikal diya aur bill bhi dal di thi, update bhi kar di thi, mail bhi kar diya tha lekin wo saman nahi deliver nahi delivery nahi de rahe wo customer ko.
Executive: Sahi hai haan haan, accha.
Customer: Maine pura payment bhi kiya hua hai, phir bhi delivery nahi de rahe hain, keh rahe hain pehle complaint remove karao.
Customer: Main keh rahi hu pehle aap delivery de do, main complaint.
Executive: Pehle delivery ke baad complaint remove hoga, bol dijiye unko.
Customer: Hai na? Main mujhe kya karna hai, mujhe kya karna hai complaint rakh ke?
Executive: Haan bol dijiye, complaint remove kar dijiye, aapke paas to proof bhi ho jayega ki humne delivery de di hai.
Customer: Ab wo maan hi nahi rahe hain, aap apni taraf se call karao aur badtameezi alag kar rahe hain ki use use blackmail karo jo darta ho, mere paas screenshot hai, main dal dungi aapko.
Executive: Aap dal do aur unko bol dijiye ki aap delivery de dijiye, complaint wapas ho jayega, waise thodi complaint hum rakh ke kya karenge? Unko bol dijiye ki aapke paas bhi right hai, aap bhi apna dobara delivery deke agar complaint na khatam ho to kar sakte ho, to isme to aisa kuch hai hi nahi hai, pehle band karo aur aisa nahi denge delivery.
Customer: Main kya kahun? Ek to wo phone uthate hi nahi hai, hai na? Aadmi kahega to jab jab koi phone uthayega.
Customer: Dusri baat ye ki badtameezi karte hain, dekho aap maine screenshot dal diya.
Customer: Ki use bhai maine kya blackmail kiya, aapko ye to right hai na hamara agar aap customer ko response nahi doge, uska phone nahi uthaoge, pura payment hone ke bawajud bhi delivery nahi doge, to wo kya karega?
Executive: Main samajh raha hu aapki baat.
Customer: Ab main aapse jo baat kar rahi hu, main as a seller baat nahi kar rahi hu, main aapse baat kar rahi hu as a customer.
Executive: Haan haan main samajh gaya, baat sahi hai.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Haan haan unko boliye ki dekho legal action ho sakta hai, aap please isko delivery kar dijiye.
Customer: Meri team already unko follow kar rahi hai, unko bol rahi hai, unko pata hoga ye baat.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Haan saman nikalwa diya unhone, saman Noida pahunch bhi chuka hai lekin wo delivery nahi dilwa rahe hain customer ko.
Executive: Main samajh raha hu delivery, unko bol dijiye ek baar hum log bolwa bhi dete hain message pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai bhai delivery.
Customer: Dusra actually yahi concern hai.
Customer: Mera number nahi hai kya aapke paas?
Customer: Mere paas hai na, maine duniya ke har number se call kar liya unhe, wo kahin se call nahi uthate.
Executive: Arey mera number nahi hai, main ye puch raha hu.
Customer: Haan aapka number to hai mere paas.
Executive: Mere se kar leti aap call.
Customer: Chaliye ab aapke paas karungi, wo Akshay ji ne ki thi na mujhse pehle bhi baat, to main isiliye unhe kar rahi hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi agar unka na lage to aap mujhse kar sakte ho, hai na?
Customer: Chaliye ab main aap hi ko karungi.
Executive: Haan theek hai na, main yahi concern tha na, close kar dijiye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai experience de dijiye ga, baki unko directly hum log follow kar lete hain, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai sir, thank you.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving delivery after full payment.

- Seller not responding and being rude.

- Wants executive to call seller for delivery.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to follow up with seller.

- Advised customer to inform seller about legal action.

- Executive offered his number for future assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up with the seller.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- delivery, complaint, follow up, seller
